_sText:
kz bhop awf3l is the successor to the critically acclaimed and widely loved bhop awful, often considered the best map in existence, as well as the legendary and mysterious bhop awful2. 
This map seeks to uphold the same standards as both these maps, and lives very well up to this huge responsibility.
- _"Why do you keep making these maps, Aux?" -ShotgunBFFL, faste hops_
Some believe this map is made by God himself. Some people are right. Seemingly nothing can be improved on this masterpiece of a map, combining science and religion into a single map, made for YOUR enjoyment!
And enjoy it I hope you do!! ~Aux

(PS. The map should be doable on any setting, other than 400u/s cap... I'm not sure about that one)
